question: Write at least 150 words. You have seen a job advertised in the newspaper. You want toapply for the job.Write a letter to the manager of the company.In your letter• provide information about yourself• give details of your previous work experience• Say why the company should consider you for the job You do NOT need to write anyaddresses. Begin your letter as follows:Dear Sir,
text: Through this letter, I want to express my interest in the vacant position , of senior product owner, which is being offered by your company .

I  completed my bachelor's degree in information technology from the renowned institute "RKDF University"10 years ago then pursued my masters in the same stream. Currently , I am working in Neo company as a role at product analyst for almost 3 years, with a total experience of 7 years . In this ,company my major role is coordinating with clients to gather  information and create user stories which are further developed by developers. Additionally, I have done a few certifications in Agile such as PSM1  and PSPO1.

Please find my complete details , in the curriculum vitae, attached along with this letter. Along with this, is a recommendation letter required from my existing company from my existing reporting manager? If so , then kindly give me at least 2 days' time for arranging the same.
